data.title: Gillespie's Flowers & Events
data.meta_description: About Us from Gillespie's Flowers & Events in White Sulphur Springs, WV
data.text:
Gillespie's Flowers & Events has been in business since 1923, delivering fresh arrangements, potted plants and gourmet baskets to White Sulphur Springs and surrounding areas.

Our Business was started by Kenneth M Gillespie at The Greenbrier Resort and on Main Street White Sulphur Springs, WV. We are a florist handling day to day flower orders locally, funerals, birthdays, get well, etc. as well as an event florist for Weddings, Corporate and Social Events. We have various Tent structures and rental items available. We have a graphics department, for making custom signs and banners. We have a gift shop with home décor items and gift items and Women' clothing. We have a large staff and multiple delivery vehicles, and can get the job completed. We do our best to accommodate special requests. We like to use local growers when product available. Many employees have been here for 15+ years. The 3 owners have been raised up in the business.

We're a local White Sulphur Springs, West Virginia florist with a lovely variety of fresh flowers and creative gift ideas to suit any style or budget. Our talented team of designers can customize simple floral designs to large corporate events and weddings.

It is our pleasure to assist you with any local, as well as worldwide deliveries and remember that corporate accounts are always welcome. For your convenience, we offer daily floral delivery to local funeral homes and hospitals.

We hope you enjoy your online shopping experience with secure 24-hour ordering right at your fingertips. If preferred, you may call us to place orders direct at (304) 536-1991.

Assorted House Plants & Gift Ideas for All Seasons and Reasons ~

Shop from our Green Plants, Blooming Plants and Dish Gardens for a gift that adds life to any room or office.

We also offer a variety of other choices…

Fruit Baskets, Gourmet Baskets, Gift Baskets, Baby Gifts, Candy & Chocolates, Gifts, Greeting Cards, Home Décor, Scented Candles, Silk Flower Arrangements, Plush Stuffed Animals and more!

Custom Wedding Flowers & Flowers for Special Occasions

Let us create bouquets, flower arrangements and on-site decorations, as well as speciality decor and lighting to make your vision become reality. Call us at (304) 536-1991 to schedule a consultation. We would love to help you start planning flowers for an extravagant meeting, intimate nuptials or any special event – large or small.

In addition, we have all the elements to make your next event complete: tables, chairs, linens, china and tents.

Send Sympathy Arrangements & Funeral Flowers from the Heart

Remember, you can also depend on us when you need to send flowers for the funeral of a friend or loved one. We will design and deliver a funeral arrangement that thoughtfully conveys your feelings of sympathy and serves as a lovely tribute to the deceased.
